channel.description: The Persians also have wizards and giant creatures and mercenaries from all the countries they have conquered. Which is pretty much any country that has giant animals available at the moment. Damn these Persians! Our heroes slaughter wave after wave of barbarian invaders in high def ultra-violence. But they deserve it. They cross breed with llamas! Seriously. Have you seen this movie? Can you wait for the DVD? Have you read the book?

item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“darealman, post:38, topic:83658”]This movie is a real shit movie, this movie is that kind of movie to brainwash people and giving them the wrong idea of how Persians was, first of all, it was something along 7k Greeks/Spartas/Whatever vs around 20k Persians. The Persians were marching towards Athen, they didn’t know that they were going to be 7k Greeks, so you can’t really call them cowards. Don’t believe in anything that is said or shown in this movie, other than the war actually took place in real life. The history is all wrong.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 01, 2007, 05:15:57 AM[/size][hr]This movie is a propaganda movie against Iran, to make the people start hating Iran and the iranians. Therefore any future attacks on Iran would be more acceptable by the public probably.

Check out this site, this guy explains it all very well. http://forums.tweakguides.com/showthread.php?p=65050#post65050

If you want to know anything else more about this matter, get on IRC.

<3 Xerxes
[center] Warned[/center][/quote]
I am sorry Xerxes. The winners write the history books. I do not like dictators like your self. I do like democracy.
I don’t like Iran. If it was up to me it would be a glass palace.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 01, 2007, 05:33:05 AM[/size][hr][quote=“darealman, post:1, topic:87897”]The winners write the history book, yet history is what I just said. Looool. Everyone, says it was 7k vs 20k, and so on, please take your head out of your anus.
[center] 10 minute Ban[/center][/quote]
The movie was about a battle not the entire war. You are quoting things out of contexts. It was 300 who did give their lives, not 7000. The movie is called the 300.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“Hex Key, post:20, topic:83658”][quote author=nightwolf link=topic=122930.msg1208622#msg1208622 date=1177398185]

relatively plotless, but as far as action goes it was very good.

It wasn’t plot less, it was about the king of Sparta fighting for his city and his people if it is plot less I guess most wars are :/?
[/quote]

by being able to sum it up like that shows how plotless it is.[/quote]

So… its a good movie… i love the rich colours and the dark strong shadows… probably the best peice of filming i have seen for a long time.

Cant wait for it to come out on dvd for better quality at home… i have watched it in the cinema but i wouldn’t mind watching is as good as that at home.

Anyone who wants to watch it… http://joox.net/stage6/?cat=2&id=1172098
